titleInfo.title: Johnny Rivers at the Memorial Gym

mods.abstract: Three color half sheet (green and orange on yellow) announcing the Johnny Rivers "Memphis Special" starring Johnny Rivers, Chad Stewart and Jeremy Clyde, Ronnie and the Daytonas, and the Ventures at the Memorial Gym at Middle Tennessee State College on October 23. Poster features a metal photoplate of Johnny Rivers.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
